name: International Association for Veterinary Homeopathy
goal: International association of veterinary homeopaths. The goal is to preserve and to develop the knowledge, understanding and practical perception of veterinary homeopathy
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumers, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Antimicrobial resistance, new veterinary medicines law - EU Regulation COM (2014)0558
Lobby for research into alternative and integrative medicine (veterinary and human)
